task.summary: Default task
Plugged in set finished date btn in edit view.
Completed 'meta' edit tab so user can now view & update book details.
List view now displays the calculated percentage progress of each book (required for 'paper' book readers #KindeMasterRace).
Set the books title as the Title on the edit page
Added explicit cancel button to the date picker (it feels more obvious than having to tap the edges or press back - & its what lord Duarte does in Keep #InHoloWeTrust).
When the customer changes the start date, persist the new book entry.
Made all views scrollable to ensure all content can be viewed/enjoyed.

fixed bug on rotation of device when adding new bug & no fields modified app would crash due to the book getting deleted in the OnPause(). The IfEmpty check now also checks to see if you have changed the started date from today, and will save the new book if the user has. Removed some BNR code relating to displaying a subtitle on the toolbar (I dont see a use case for this within paper trail).
Improved the english of a title.
when user sets a finished date, also set the progress to 100%; and update the UI to reflect the change.
Validate the Progress field to not allow values above the book.Length
Added a slider to update your progress.
Removed toolbar menu from list page. Theirs no point duplicating the add new book button on the page.
Finished removing nav drawer spike.
Implemented template navigation drawer. Using a single activity to control all page switching between activities.
Fixed all layouts for new NoActionBar app theme (for the navigation menu).
Fixed grammar error in my usage of your VS you're. Styled navigation menu for my specific use case. Put in placeholder messages till i build the archive/list functionality.
Deleted unused baseActivity settings menu. Forgot to git add logo used in navigation drawer.
If attempting to open the current page from the nav draw, do nothing.
Use the same string resource as the label, in case I change it in the future.
Added Book categories for future stats/grouping/possible_swim_lanes.
Created & populated Archive page. Don't auto open keyboard on details/create book page's.
Change archive list item layout (made each item smaller to fit in all your literary progress).
Added a divider between list items in the archive page.
Added labels to the book details on the archive page.
Only set the finished date the first time you go to 100% progress. Capitalise words for the author inputs.
Added reading list page, using the 'ArchiveActivity' template.
Added state to book to track which list they should appear.
Replaced hardcoded strings wich app wide constants.
Enabled adding books to your book queue.
Gave reading list items material update.
Using the same margin/padding style/set-up for both cardviews in the app.

Added contextual based icons for the navigation drawer. Fixed bug toggling book between reading/archived. Update the toolbar as the user changes the title. Fill in the finished date on the UI when the user sets the progress to 100%. Used App colour palette for card background on reading list page.
Added toggle to book details view. I'm thinking this will control weather a book is currently being read or just on the reading list.
Transfer books state between finished/active/reading list using a toggle in the book details view.
Make it easier to precisely up update your progress, by using a NumberPicker.
Updated libraries. Experimenting with animating the book cover between the pages it appears on. Deleted input validator as the NumberPicker has this functionality out of the box.
Animating the book image between the archive & book details pages.

CardView OnTouch colour change interaction. Progress view - removed unneeded margin @ the top. Change title of active page to 'currently reading'. Deleted Activity transition animations - they weren't smooth.
Update status_switch when progress==100 on a book your currently reading. This was done by exposing the toggle to be accessed by its child views fragment.
Hide permanent delete behind a menu.
Coloured circle initial in archive items instead of book image
Make archive list items smaller (height & letter circle)
If updating progress from zero - set dateStarted to today
Designed Note table. Note table initialisation. Renamed colums to remove type pre-fix.

Retrieve all notes for the book whose details you're looking at. Added 'Google Keep like' textbox which ive overrode the on click behaviour so it can (later) launch the new note page. Added the Notes tab to the book details page.
Populate the view with a list of all notes for the book. Fixed layout bug where the scrollview had a weird padding before the draggable space begun.
Reverted rename as git lost the file somehow ?!?
Take notes in a book. Not tapping the 'make note' EditText takes you to a new activity to compose your note.

MESSAGE.value: Only set the finished date the first time you go to 100% progress. Capitalise words for the author inputs.
Added reading list page, using the 'ArchiveActivity' template.
Added state to book to track which list they should appear.
Replaced hardcoded strings wich app wide constants.
Enabled adding books to your book queue.
Gave reading list items material update.
Using the same margin/padding style/set-up for both cardviews in the app.

Added contextual based icons for the navigation drawer. Fixed bug toggling book between reading/archived. Update the toolbar as the user changes the title. Fill in the finished date on the UI when the user sets the progress to 100%. Used App colour palette for card background on reading list page.
Added toggle to book details view. I'm thinking this will control weather a book is currently being read or just on the reading list.
Transfer books state between finished/active/reading list using a toggle in the book details view.
Make it easier to precisely up update your progress, by using a NumberPicker.
Updated libraries. Experimenting with animating the book cover between the pages it appears on. Deleted input validator as the NumberPicker has this functionality out of the box.
Animating the book image between the archive & book details pages.

CardView OnTouch colour change interaction. Progress view - removed unneeded margin @ the top. Change title of active page to 'currently reading'. Deleted Activity transition animations - they weren't smooth.
Update status_switch when progress==100 on a book your currently reading. This was done by exposing the toggle to be accessed by its child views fragment.
Hide permanent delete behind a menu.
Coloured circle initial in archive items instead of book image
Make archive list items smaller (height & letter circle)
If updating progress from zero - set dateStarted to today
Started building object & db table to house notes from whatever your reading.
Designed Note table. Note table initialisation. Renamed colums to remove type pre-fix.

Retrieve all notes for the book whose details you're looking at. Added 'Google Keep like' textbox which ive overrode the on click behaviour so it can (later) launch the new note page. Added the Notes tab to the book details page.
Populate the view with a list of all notes for the book. Fixed layout bug where the scrollview had a weird padding before the draggable space begun.
Reverted rename as git lost the file somehow ?!?
Take notes in a book. Not tapping the 'make note' EditText takes you to a new activity to compose your note.

option.name: LAST_COMMIT_MESSAGE
option.value: Take notes in a book. Not tapping the 'make note' EditText takes you to a new activity to compose your note.
